pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines for Using Our Services rentcasino@gmail.com +91-961-9655662 RentCasino Home About Us We have Why are we Our promisedе Rent Terms of Use Equipment Availability We strive to maintain a wide selection of casino equipment for rent on our website. However, we cannot guarantee the availability of any particular item at any given time. We reserve the right to refuse any rental request for any reason, including, but not limited to, equipment availability, customer eligibility, or potential liability. Equipment Inspection and Acceptance Upon delivery of the equipment, you or your designated representative must inspect the equipment and notify us of any damage or defects within 24 hours. If you fail to notify us within 24 hours, the equipment will be deemed accepted in good condition. If you notify us of any damage or defects within 24 hours, we will repair or replace the equipment at our sole discretion. Equipment Return You must return the equipment to us in the same condition as it was delivered, normal wear and tear excepted. You are responsible for packing and shipping the equipment back to us at your own expense. If you fail to return the equipment within the specified rental period or if the equipment is returned damaged or incomplete, you will be charged additional fees. Equipment Insurance You are responsible for obtaining and maintaining adequate insurance coverage for the equipment during the rental period. We recommend that you obtain insurance coverage for theft, loss, damage, and liability. You agree to provide us with proof of insurance upon request. Equipment Modification You may not modify, alter, or repair the equipment without our prior written consent. Any unauthorized modification, alteration, or repair of the equipment may result in additional fees and/or termination of your rental agreement. Equipment Maintenance You are responsible for maintaining the equipment in good condition during the rental period. You agree to follow our instructions and any applicable laws and regulations regarding the use and maintenance of the equipment. If the equipment requires maintenance or repair during the rental period, you must notify us immediately. We will arrange for the maintenance or repair of the equipment at our sole discretion. Equipment Recall We reserve the right to recall any equipment at any time for any reason, including, but not limited to, safety concerns, maintenance issues, or manufacturer recalls. If we recall any equipment, we will provide you with a replacement or refund any prepaid rental fees. No Agency No joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship exists between you and RentCasino as a result of these Terms of Use or your use of our website or services. If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at rentcasino@gmail.com. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Information rentcasino@gmail.com +91-961-9655662 RentCasino Home About Us We have Why are we Our promisedе Rent Privacy Policy Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We will also retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Cross-Border Data Transfers We may transfer your personal information to countries outside of India for processing or storage. When we do so, we will take appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information is protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites, products, or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Children's Privacy Our website and services are not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible. Do Not Track Some web browsers have a "Do Not Track" feature that allows you to indicate that you do not want your online activities tracked. We do not currently respond to "Do Not Track" signals. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will post the updated policy on this page and indicate the date of the last revision. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us at rentcasino@gmail.com.
